title: New Zealand v Australia: international men’s football friendly – live
summary: The Socceroos and All Whites face off again in a week for the 'Soccer Ashes'. Martin Pegan provides minute-by-minute updates on the match. This is their second confrontation in recent days.

title: ‘It’s so different from the media narrative’: telling a different story of 7 October
summary: Brandon Kramer's documentary "Holding Liat" explores the impact of Hamas attacks on an Israeli family facing separation. Despite their struggles, they hold onto hopes for reconciliation amid the chaos. The film highlights the personal toll of conflict and the quest for unity.

title: Anglo American agrees mining mega merger; Londoners face commuting struggles as tube strike enters second day – business live
summary: A merger is set to create a $53 billion mining giant, relocating its headquarters to Vancouver. This consolidation has sparked concerns about potential job cuts. The deal reflects ongoing trends in the mining industry towards larger entities.

title: Anglo American to merge with rival Teck in $53bn mining group
summary: Two major copper producers are set to merge while maintaining their listing in London. The merger raises concerns about potential job cuts as the companies streamline operations. This consolidation in the industry highlights ongoing trends towards efficiency and cost-saving measures.
